>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/accounts/emailinfolder"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets an account email in a folder with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"mailbox_id":{"description":"Mailbox ID","type":"integer"},"email_in_folder":{"description":"Document folder ID","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}

  responses={undefined}
